citations.narrative:
- In the indoor barn, a cage housing a mongoose had an excessive accumulation of food scraps, waste, and debris. This
is a source of potential contamination to the animal. The facility must clean this enclosure, and maintain it at an
appropriate level of cleanliness to protect the health and welfare of the animal.
Corrected at the time of inspection

- The food preparation area was cluttered and in need of cleaning. There were numerous dirty bowls waiting to be
washed, and there was spilled feed on the ground next to the prep table. A live mouse was spotted in this area during
inspection. These conditions serve as an attractant for pests and insects, which are a potential source of contamination to
animal feed. The facility must clean this area, and maintain it an appropriate level of cleanliness in the future.
Correct by: 15 February 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

- The food preparation area was cluttered and in need of cleaning. There were numerous dirty bowls waiting to be
